title: Why is there an assortment of IP Prices for champions?

replies.body:
Because a lot of money can be made off people who don't want to wait a long time to earn all champions.

You can buy accounts or RP; the first being a bit cheaper, but at a higher risk.
so you are pressured to spend real money on cool champions. thats why the neato champs are 6300 ip and garen is 450.
he is asking why some champs are more expensive than others.

Oh, older champions are generally cheaper, and it is also a convenient way to gate newer players away from more complex champions.

It is also a quality thing. The better the quality on a champ the more expensive it is, same as any other good. Most of the exceptions to this are ones that were reworked after their release, as they do not increase the price after those.
